name: Infernape E4 LV.X
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Intimidating Roar
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon. This power can’t be used if Infernape E4 is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy attached to Infernape E4.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Infernape E4. Infernape E4 LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
